kpi.name: M1023C22

kpi_info.title: TRANSFERRED DATA FOR BACKGROUND IN DL
kpi_info.use: The amount of MAC-d PDU background data in SRNC in downlink direction measured during the measurement interval. This counter includes both Rel99 DCH and HS-DSCH. UPDATED: The counter is updated at 20-second intervals. If the UE is in softer handover, then the counter is updated for only one cell once per each BTS.

kpi.kpi_alias: TRANSFERRED DATA FOR BACKGROUND IN DL
